abstracts.cdata!:
The Development Finance Companies
            Project will assist the private sector in Colombia by
            providing medium and long-term finance to cover the foreign
            exchange portion of investments primarily in industry, said
            investments to be made by the Financieras in the form of
            loans or equity participations.
